comment: Smart Data Models - ExcAC8B adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcAC8B/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Modified IEEE AC8B alternator-supplied rectifier excitation system with speed input and input limiter.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: inlim
contents.comment: Input limiter indicator. true = input limiter Vimax and Vimin is considered false = input limiter Vimax and Vimin is not considered. Typical Value = true. Default: False

contents.name: ka
contents.comment: Voltage regulator gain (Ka).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kc
contents.comment: Rectifier loading factor proportional to commutating reactance (Kc). Typical Value = 0.55. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kd
contents.comment: Demagnetizing factor, a function of exciter alternator reactances (Kd).  Typical Value = 1.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kdr
contents.comment: Voltage regulator derivative gain (Kdr).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ke
contents.comment: Exciter constant related to self-excited field (Ke).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kir
contents.comment: Voltage regulator integral gain (Kir).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kpr
contents.comment: Voltage regulator proportional gain (Kpr).  Typical Value = 80. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ks
contents.comment: Coefficient to allow different usage of the model-speed coefficient (Ks).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: pidlim
contents.comment: PID limiter indicator. true = input limiter Vpidmax and Vpidmin is considered false = input limiter Vpidmax and Vpidmin is not considered. Typical Value = true. Default: False

contents.name: seve1
contents.comment: Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, Ve, back of commutating reactance (Se[Ve1]).  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0.0

contents.name: seve2
contents.comment: Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, Ve, back of commutating reactance (Se[Ve2]).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: ta
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (Ta).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tdr
contents.comment: Lag time constant (Tdr).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

contents.name: te
contents.comment: Exciter time constant, integration rate associated with exciter control (Te).  Typical Value = 1.2. Default: 0

contents.name: telim
contents.comment: Selector for the limiter on the block [1/sTe].  See diagram for meaning of true and false. Typical Value = false. Default: False

contents.name: ve1
contents.comment: Exciter alternator output voltages back of commutating reactance at which saturation is defined (Ve) equals V (Ve1).  Typical Value = 6.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ve2
contents.comment: Exciter alternator output voltages back of commutating reactance at which saturation is defined (Ve).  Typical Value = 9. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vemin
contents.comment: Minimum exciter voltage output (Vemin).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vfemax
contents.comment: Exciter field current limit reference (Vfemax).  Typical Value = 6. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vimax
contents.comment: Input signal maximum (Vimax).  Typical Value = 35. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vimin
contents.comment: Input signal minimum (Vimin).  Typical Value = -10. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vpidmax
contents.comment: PID maximum controller output (Vpidmax).  Typical Value = 35. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vpidmin
contents.comment: PID minimum controller output (Vpidmin).  Typical Value = -10. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator output (Vrmax). Typical Value = 35. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator output (Vrmin).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vtmult
contents.comment: Multiply by generator`s terminal voltage indicator. true =the limits Vrmax and Vrmin are multiplied by the generator`s terminal voltage to represent a thyristor power stage fed from the generator terminals false = limits are not multiplied by generator`s terminal voltage.  Typical Value = false. Default: False

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
